																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">iPhone chips enhance everything you do. Our latest chips unlock Apple&nbsp;Intelligence, power advanced photo features like latest‑generation Photographic Styles, and enable AAA&nbsp;gaming.</p>

																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Our hardware and software are designed to work together efficiently, so you can do more on a single charge — like watching up to 33 hours of video on iPhone&nbsp;16&nbsp;Pro&nbsp;Max.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-6" aria-label="Footnote 3, Close battery section" data-modal-close="">3</a></sup></p>

																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy"><br>iPhone + 5G = a superfast experience.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-7" aria-label="Footnote 4, Close battery section" data-modal-close="">4</a></sup> And when you don’t need all that speed, iPhone shifts into Smart Data mode to preserve battery life.</p>

																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Snap on a MagSafe Charger.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-8" aria-label="Footnote 5, Close battery section" data-modal-close="">5</a></sup> Or plug in a USB‑C Power Adapter. iPhone&nbsp;15 and later have USB‑C, so you can charge your iPhone with the same cable as your Mac and&nbsp;iPad.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-9" aria-label="Footnote 6, Close battery section" data-modal-close="">6</a></sup></p>

														<div id="modal-content-default-environment" class="feature-card-modal-content modal-content">
															<h3 class="typography-modal-topic-label modal-topic-label">Environment</h3>
															<h4 class="typography-modal-headline modal-headline">Recycle. Reuse.&nbsp;Repeat.</h4>
															<div class="feature-card-modal-tile bleed-bottom
																										">
																<div class="card" tabindex="-1">
																	<div class="card-modifier hover-disabled">
																		<div class="card-viewport-content">
																			<div class="feature-card-modal-copyblock feature-card-modal-content">
																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Innovation in conservation.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Our disassembly robots — Daisy, Dave, and Taz — recover crucial materials like gold, cobalt, tungsten, and rare earth elements from recycled iPhone devices, so they can be used to make new ones.</p>
																			</div>
																			<div class="image-container ">
																				<picture id="overview-consider-modals-environment-modal-innovation-1" class="overview-consider-modals-environment-modal-innovation responsive-image" data-lazy="" data-download-area-keyframe="{&quot;start&quot;: &quot;t - 190vh&quot;, &quot;end&quot;: &quot;b&quot;}">

																			<div class="feature-card-modal-copyblock feature-card-modal-content">
																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">More recycled content? Naturally.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">We’re significantly expanding the use of key recycled metals in iPhone batteries, magnets, and circuit boards. Case in point: Our latest models contain 95 percent recycled lithium in the battery cathode — a first for Apple.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-11" aria-label="Footnote 8, Close environment section" data-modal-close="">8</a></sup></p>

																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Apple&nbsp;Trade&nbsp;In.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">When you’re ready to buy a new iPhone, you can trade in your current iPhone or Android device and apply any credit toward your purchase. If your device isn’t eligible for credit, we’ll recycle it for&nbsp;free.</p>

															<h3 class="typography-modal-topic-label modal-topic-label">Peace of Mind</h3>
															<h4 class="typography-modal-headline modal-headline">Helpful features. <br>On and off the&nbsp;grid.</h4>
															<div class="feature-card-modal-tile bleed-bottom
																										">

																	<div class="card-modifier hover-disabled">

																			<div class="feature-card-modal-copyblock feature-card-modal-content">
																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Out of range. Not out of reach.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Unique safety features allow iPhone to connect to satellite frequencies — so you can send and receive messages via satellite, text emergency services, or get roadside assistance when you don’t have cell service or Wi‑Fi.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-13" aria-label="Footnote 10, Close safety section" data-modal-close="">10</a></sup></p>

																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">With Find&nbsp;My, you can securely share your location with friends and family. And in Messages, you can use Check In to automatically let someone know when you’ve reached your destination safely.</p>

															<h4 class="typography-modal-headline modal-headline">
																<p>Switching from Android<br> to iPhone is simple.</p>
															</h4>
															<div class="feature-card-modal-tile bleed-bottom
																										">

																	<div class="card-modifier hover-disabled">

																			<div class="feature-card-modal-copyblock feature-card-modal-content">
																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Transfer your data in a few easy steps.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Simply download the Move to iOS app on your Android phone to securely transfer the stuff you care about most to your iPhone — contacts, messages, WhatsApp content, photos, videos, email accounts, favorite apps, call history, and more.</p>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-cta">
																					<a href="https://support.apple.com/HT201196" data-analytics-title="learn more about the move to ios app" data-analytics-exit-link="" aria-label="Learn more about the Move to iOS app" class="icon-wrapper"><span class="icon-copy">Learn more about the Move&nbsp;to&nbsp;iOS&nbsp;app</span><span class="icon icon-after more"></span></a> </p>

																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Messages lets you reply with a quick emoji, create Memoji, and pay a friend for pizza. 															<h3 class="typography-modal-topic-label modal-topic-label">Designed to Last</h3>
															<h4 class="typography-modal-headline modal-headline">iPhone holds its value longer<br class="large"> than other smartphones.</h4>
															<div class="feature-card-modal-tile bleed-bottom

																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">iPhone is protected by Ceramic&nbsp;Shield, which is tougher than any smartphone glass. Little spill? 																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Get artful depth effects when you film in Cinematic mode. 														<div id="modal-content-default-environment-variant" class="feature-card-modal-content modal-content">
															<h3 class="typography-modal-topic-label modal-topic-label">Environment</h3>
															<h4 class="typography-modal-headline modal-headline">Recycle. Reuse.&nbsp;Repeat.</h4>
															<div class="feature-card-modal-tile bleed-bottom
																										">
																<div class="card" tabindex="-1">
																	<div class="card-modifier hover-disabled">
																		<div class="card-viewport-content">
																			<div class="feature-card-modal-copyblock feature-card-modal-content">
																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Innovation in conservation.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Our disassembly robots — Daisy, Dave, and Taz — recover crucial materials like gold, cobalt, tungsten, and rare earth elements from recycled iPhone devices, so they can be used to make new ones.</p>
																			</div>
																			<div class="image-container ">
																				<picture id="overview-consider-modals-environment-modal-innovation-2" class="overview-consider-modals-environment-modal-innovation responsive-image" data-lazy="" data-download-area-keyframe="{&quot;start&quot;: &quot;t - 190vh&quot;, &quot;end&quot;: &quot;b&quot;}">

																	<div class="card-modifier hover-disabled">
																		<div class="card-viewport-content">
																			<div class="feature-card-modal-copyblock feature-card-modal-content">
																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">More recycled content? Naturally.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">We’re significantly expanding the use of key recycled metals in iPhone batteries, magnets, and circuit boards. Case in point: Our latest models contain 95 percent recycled lithium in the battery cathode — a first for Apple.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-11" aria-label="Footnote 8, Close environment section" data-modal-close="">8</a></sup></p>
																			</div>

																										">

																			<div class="feature-card-modal-copyblock feature-card-modal-content">
																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Apple&nbsp;Trade&nbsp;In.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">When you’re ready to buy a new iPhone, you can trade in your current Android phone and apply any credit toward your purchase. If your device isn’t eligible for credit, we’ll recycle it for&nbsp;free.</p>
																			</div>

																			<div class="feature-card-modal-copyblock feature-card-modal-content">
																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Planet-worthy packaging.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">For the first time, iPhone packaging is 100 percent fiber based.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-12" aria-label="Footnote 9, Close environment section" data-modal-close="">9</a></sup> And there’s no plastic wrap in or around the&nbsp;box.</p>
																			</div>
																			<div class="image-container ">
																				<picture id="overview-consider-modals-environment-modal-packaging-2" class="overview-consider-modals-environment-modal-packaging responsive-image" data-lazy="" data-download-area-keyframe="{&quot;start&quot;: &quot;t - 190vh&quot;, &quot;end&quot;: &quot;b&quot;}">

																					<source srcset="/v/iphone/home/cc/images/overview/consider_modals/environment/modal_packaging__f3bxbn2li3ma_small.jpg, /v/iphone/home/cc/images/overview/consider_modals/environment/modal_packaging__f3bxbn2li3ma_small_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:734px)"><source srcset="/v/iphone/home/cc/images/overview/consider_modals/environment/modal_packaging__f3bxbn2li3ma_medium.jpg, /v/iphone/home/cc/images/overview/consider_modals/environment/modal_packaging__f3bxbn2li3ma_medium_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)"><source srcset="/v/iphone/home/cc/images/overview/consider_modals/environment/modal_packaging__f3bxbn2li3ma_large.jpg, /v/iphone/home/cc/images/overview/consider_modals/environment/modal_packaging__f3bxbn2li3ma_large_2x.jpg 2x" media="(min-width:0px)"><img src="/v/iphone/home/cc/images/overview/consider_modals/environment/modal_packaging__f3bxbn2li3ma_large.jpg" onload="__lp(event)" alt="Planet-friendly fiber-based iPhone 16 packaging.">
																				</picture>

																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Long-lasting battery life? 100%.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Our hardware and software are designed to work together efficiently, so you can do more on a single charge — like watching up to 33 hours of video on iPhone&nbsp;16&nbsp;Pro&nbsp;Max.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-6" aria-label="Footnote 3, Close battery section" data-modal-close="">3</a></sup></p>

																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Made for 5G.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy"><br>iPhone + 5G = a superfast experience.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-7" aria-label="Footnote 4, Close battery section" data-modal-close="">4</a></sup> And when you don’t need all that speed, iPhone shifts into Smart Data mode to preserve battery life.</p>

																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Power. Fully. Fast.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Snap on a MagSafe Charger.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-8" aria-label="Footnote 5, Close battery section" data-modal-close="">5</a></sup> Or plug in a USB‑C Power Adapter. iPhone&nbsp;15 and later have USB‑C, so you can charge your iPhone with the same cable as your Mac and&nbsp;iPad.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-9" aria-label="Footnote 6, Close battery section" data-modal-close="">6</a></sup></p>

														<div id="modal-content-default-environment" class="feature-card-modal-content modal-content">
															<h3 class="typography-modal-topic-label modal-topic-label">Environment</h3>
															<h4 class="typography-modal-headline modal-headline">Recycle. Reuse.&nbsp;Repeat.</h4>
															<div class="feature-card-modal-tile bleed-bottom
																										">
																<div class="card" tabindex="-1">
																	<div class="card-modifier hover-disabled">
																		<div class="card-viewport-content">
																			<div class="feature-card-modal-copyblock feature-card-modal-content">
																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Innovation in conservation.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Our disassembly robots — Daisy, Dave, and Taz — recover crucial materials like gold, cobalt, tungsten, and rare earth elements from recycled iPhone devices, so they can be used to make new ones.</p>
																			</div>
																			<div class="image-container ">
																				<picture id="overview-consider-modals-environment-modal-innovation-3" class="overview-consider-modals-environment-modal-innovation responsive-image" data-lazy="" data-download-area-keyframe="{&quot;start&quot;: &quot;t - 190vh&quot;, &quot;end&quot;: &quot;b&quot;}">

																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">More recycled content? Naturally.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">We’re significantly expanding the use of key recycled metals in iPhone batteries, magnets, and circuit boards. Case in point: Our latest models contain 95 percent recycled lithium in the battery cathode — a first for Apple.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-11" aria-label="Footnote 8, Close environment section" data-modal-close="">8</a></sup></p>

																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Apple&nbsp;Trade&nbsp;In.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">When you’re ready to buy a new iPhone, you can trade in your current iPhone or Android device and apply any credit toward your purchase. If your device isn’t eligible for credit, we’ll recycle it for&nbsp;free.</p>

																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Planet-worthy packaging.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">For the first time, iPhone packaging is 100 percent fiber based.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-12" aria-label="Footnote 9, Close environment section" data-modal-close="">9</a></sup> And there’s no plastic wrap in or around the&nbsp;box.</p>

																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">On track to carbon neutral.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Our stores, offices, and data centers are already carbon neutral. By 2030, Apple will be carbon neutral across our entire carbon footprint.</p>

															<h4 class="typography-modal-headline modal-headline">
																<p>Switching from Android<br> to iPhone is simple.</p>
															</h4>
															<div class="feature-card-modal-tile bleed-bottom
																										">
																<div class="card" tabindex="-1">
																	<div class="card-modifier hover-disabled">

																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Simply download the Move to iOS app on your Android phone to securely transfer the stuff you care about most to your iPhone — contacts, messages, WhatsApp content, photos, videos, email accounts, favorite apps, call history, and more.</p>

																					<a href="https://support.apple.com/HT201196" data-analytics-title="learn more about the move to ios app" data-analytics-exit-link="" aria-label="Learn more about the Move to iOS app" class="icon-wrapper"><span class="icon-copy">Learn more about the Move&nbsp;to&nbsp;iOS&nbsp;app</span><span class="icon icon-after more"></span></a> </p>

																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Get artful depth effects when you film in Cinematic mode. Use Action mode to steady shaky scenes as you shoot. Boost the voices of the people in your video with Audio Mix. 														<div id="modal-content-default-environment-variant" class="feature-card-modal-content modal-content">
															<h3 class="typography-modal-topic-label modal-topic-label">Environment</h3>
															<h4 class="typography-modal-headline modal-headline">Recycle. Reuse.&nbsp;Repeat.</h4>
															<div class="feature-card-modal-tile bleed-bottom
																										">
																<div class="card" tabindex="-1">
																	<div class="card-modifier hover-disabled">
																		<div class="card-viewport-content">
																			<div class="feature-card-modal-copyblock feature-card-modal-content">
																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Innovation in conservation.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Our disassembly robots — Daisy, Dave, and Taz — recover crucial materials like gold, cobalt, tungsten, and rare earth elements from recycled iPhone devices, so they can be used to make new ones.</p>
																			</div>
																			<div class="image-container ">
																				<picture id="overview-consider-modals-environment-modal-innovation-4" class="overview-consider-modals-environment-modal-innovation responsive-image" data-lazy="" data-download-area-keyframe="{&quot;start&quot;: &quot;t - 190vh&quot;, &quot;end&quot;: &quot;b&quot;}">

																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">More recycled content? Naturally.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">We’re significantly expanding the use of key recycled metals in iPhone batteries, magnets, and circuit boards. Case in point: Our latest models contain 95 percent recycled lithium in the battery cathode — a first for Apple.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-11" aria-label="Footnote 8, Close environment section" data-modal-close="">8</a></sup></p>

																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Apple&nbsp;Trade&nbsp;In.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">When you’re ready to buy a new iPhone, you can trade in your current Android phone and apply any credit toward your purchase. If your device isn’t eligible for credit, we’ll recycle it for&nbsp;free.</p>

																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Planet-worthy packaging.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">For the first time, iPhone packaging is 100 percent fiber based.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-12" aria-label="Footnote 9, Close environment section" data-modal-close="">9</a></sup> And there’s no plastic wrap in or around the&nbsp;box.</p>

																			<div class="feature-card-modal-copyblock feature-card-modal-content">
																				<h5 class="feature-card-modal-copy-highlight typography-feature-card-modal-copy">On track to carbon neutral.</h5>
																				<p class="feature-card-modal-copy typography-feature-card-modal-copy">Our stores, offices, and data centers are already carbon neutral. By 2030, Apple will be carbon neutral across our entire carbon footprint.</p>
